front.title: A New Data Chunk for Stream Control Transmission Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes an extension to Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) which adds a new data chunk to SCTP. This new chunk is designed to follow closely the existing DATA chunk but incorporates a new field in the header, the Fragmentation Sequence Number (FSN). This new field is used for the purposes of fragmentation of large messages without causing head of line blocking.
